All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ArtificialPlayer
Represents an artificial (computer-controlled) player capable of generating random moves.
Board
Represents a Tic-Tac-Toe board of a given size with a grid of tiles.
ConsoleColors
Utility class that defines ANSI escape codes for coloring console output.
Fr
Contains the different texts to display
HumanPlayer
Represents a human player in the Tic-Tac-Toe game.
InteractionUtilisateur
Handles user input interactions through the console.
Main
 
Player
Represents a player with a specific symbol and color.
RandomCoordinateCapable
Defines a contract for objects capable of generating a random coordinate to play.
TicTacToe
Handles the logic of a Tic-Tac-Toe game, including player moves and board display.
Tile
Represents a single tile on a board.
View
Provides basic console output methods for displaying messages to the user.
